title: Oda Nobuna no Yabou - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Ecchi   Fantasy   Harem   Historical   Shounen
tags: Adapted to Anime   Adapted to Manga   Alternate World   Androgynous Characters   Arrogant Characters   Average-looking Protagonist   Charismatic Protagonist   Chuunibyou   Clever Protagonist   Dense Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heterochromia   Loli   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Perverted Protagonist   Polygamy   Proactive Protagonist   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Samurai   Stoic Characters   Strong Love Interests   Time Travel   Tsundere   Weak Protagonist   Yandere
author: Kasuga Mikage
description: Suddenly finding himself in the Sengoku era, regular high school student Sagara Yoshiharu is about to be killed in the battlefield. He is saved by none other than the man who later becomes the infamous Toyotomi Hideyoshi but at a cost to his life. With history completely changed because of Yoshiharu's actions, he tries to make things right again but it seems that history is taking a different course than the one he learned in school. Oda Nobunaga is now a brilliant but young girl named Oda Nobuna. Yoshiharu starts working under her command to bring back history to its correct course and find his way back home to the present world.>
